title: Friends of Farthing Downs - Image Asset Master Index
description: Comprehensive metadata index of all image assets from the legacy website

wildlife.notes: Batch 1 - Wildlife images including birds, mammals, insects, plants

history.notes: Batch 2 - Historical images including aerial photos, tea rooms, archaeological finds

archaeology.notes: Batch 3 - Archaeological images from Saxon cemetery excavations and artifact illustrations

general.notes: Batch 4 - General site images including logos, maps, committee photos, walks

fungi.notes: Batch 5 - Fungi foray images from November 2014, with species identifications

duplicate_candidates.recommendation: Consolidate during migration to reduce redundancy

quality_analysis.human_remains_note: SkeletonHeads.jpg and Skeletons3.jpg contain human remains - review for public display appropriateness
quality_analysis.poisonous_fungi_note: Images of Agaricus xanthodermus, Mycena pura, and Hypholoma fasciculare should be clearly labelled as poisonous
quality_analysis.copyright_note: Kestrel Alamy INFRINGEMENT.jpg in wildlife folder may have licensing issues

migration_recommendations.description: Select one canonical FoFD logo and use consistently across new site
Images duplicated between history-images/ and images/ should be stored in one location
Review Kestrel Alamy INFRINGEMENT.jpg - may need to be removed or properly licensed
FoFD-QR.jpg and ScanMe.jpg need verification that they link to correct URLs
SkeletonHeads.jpg and Skeletons3.jpg may not be suitable for prominent display
Clearly label poisonous species in fungi gallery with appropriate warnings
Line breaker.jpg, Man.jpg, Woman.jpg may not be needed in modern design

processing_log.notes: All 5 image categories now processed. 173 images catalogued with metadata.
